verses.verse: And <WG2532> when the sabbath<WG4521> was past<WG1230>, Mary<WG3137> Magdalene<WG3094>, and<WG2532> Mary<WG3137> the<WG3588> mother of James<WG2385>, and<WG2532> Salome<WG4539>, bought<WG59> spices<WG759>, that<WG2443> they might come<WG2064> and anoint<WG218> him<WG846>.
And <WG2532> very<WG3029> early<WG4404> on the first<WG1520> day of the week<WG4521>, they come<WG2064> to<WG1909> the tomb<WG3419> when the sun<WG2246> was risen<WG393>.
And <WG2532> they were saying<WG3004> among<WG4314> themselves<WG1438>, Who<WG5101> shall roll<WG617> us<WG2254> away<WG617> the stone<WG3037> from<WG1537> the door<WG2374> of the tomb<WG3419>?
and <WG2532> looking<WG308> up<WG2334>, they see that<WG3754> the stone<WG3037> is rolled back<WG617>: for<WG1063> it was<WG2258> exceeding<WG4970> great<WG3173>.

And <WG2532> entering<WG1525> into<WG1519> the tomb<WG3419>, they saw<WG1492> a young man<WG3495> sitting<WG2521> on<WG1722> the right side<WG1188>, arrayed<WG4016> in a<WG4749> white<WG3022> robe<WG4749>; and<WG2532> they were amazed<WG1568>.

And <WG1161> he saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Be<WG1568> not<WG3361> amazed<WG1568>: ye seek<WG2212> Jesus<WG2424>, the Nazarene<WG3479>, who<WG3588> hath been crucified<WG4717>: he is risen<WG1453>; he is<WG2076> not<WG3756> here<WG5602>: behold<WG1492>, the place<WG5117> where<WG3699> they laid<WG5087> him<WG846>!

But <WG235> go<WG5217>, tell<WG2036> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> and<WG2532> Peter<WG4074>, He<WG3754> goeth before<WG4254> you<WG5209> into<WG1519> Galilee<WG1056>: there<WG1563> shall ye see<WG3700> him<WG846>, as<WG2531> he said<WG2036> unto you<WG5213>.

And <WG2532> they went out<WG1831>, and<WG5035> fled<WG5343> from<WG575> the tomb<WG3419>; for1161, 846 trembling2192, 5156 and<WG2532> astonishment<WG1611> had come upon them<WG2532>: and they<WG2036> said nothing<WG3762> to any<WG3762> one<WG1063>; for they were afraid<WG5399>.

Now when<WG1161> he was risen<WG450> early<WG4404> on the first<WG4413> day of the week<WG4521>, he appeared<WG5316> first<WG4412> to Mary<WG3137> Magdalene<WG3094>, from<WG575> whom<WG3739> he had cast<WG1544> out seven<WG2033> demons<WG1140>.
She went<WG4198> and told<WG518> them that<WG1565> had been<WG1096> with<WG3326> him<WG846>, as they mourned<WG3996> and<WG2532> wept<WG2799>.
And they<WG2548>, when they heard<WG191> that<WG3754> he was alive<WG2198>, and<WG2532> had been seen<WG2300> of<WG5259> her<WG846>, disbelieved<WG569>.

And after<WG3326> these<WG5023> things he was manifested<WG5319> in<WG1722> another<WG2087> form<WG3444> unto two<WG1417> of<WG1537> them<WG846>, as they walked<WG4043>, on their way<WG4198> into<WG1519> the country<WG68>.
And they<WG2548> went<WG565> away and told<WG518> it unto the rest<WG3062>: neither<WG3761> believed they<WG4100> them<WG1565>.

And afterward<WG5305> he was manifested<WG5319> unto the eleven<WG1733> themselves as they<WG846> sat at meat<WG345>; and<WG2532> he upbraided<WG3679> them with their<WG846> unbelief<WG570> and<WG2532> hardness of heart<WG4641>, because<WG3754> they believed<WG4100> not<WG3756> them that<WG3588> had seen<WG2300> him<WG846> after he was risen<WG1453>.
And <WG2532> he said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Go ye<WG4198> into<WG1519> all<WG537> the world<WG2889>, and preach<WG2784> the gospel<WG2098> to the whole<WG3956> creation<WG2937>.
He <WG3588> that believeth<WG4100> and<WG2532> is baptized<WG907> shall be saved<WG4982>; but<WG1161> he<WG3588> that disbelieveth<WG569> shall be condemned<WG2632>.

And <WG1161> these<WG5023> signs<WG4592> shall accompany<WG3877> them<WG3588> that believe<WG4100>: in<WG1722> my<WG3450> name<WG3686> shall they cast out<WG1544> demons<WG1140>; they shall speak<WG2980> with new<WG2537> tongues<WG1100>;

they shall take up<WG142> serpents<WG3789>, and if<WG2579> they drink<WG4095> any<WG5100> deadly<WG2286> thing<WG5100>, it shall in no<WG3364> wise hurt<WG984> them<WG846>; they shall lay<WG2007> hands<WG5495> on<WG1909> the sick<WG732>, and<WG2532> they shall<WG2192> recover<WG2573>.

So <WG3767> then<WG3303> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG3326>, after he had spoken<WG2980> unto them<WG846>, was received up<WG353> into<WG1519> heaven<WG3772>, and<WG2532> sat<WG2523> down at<WG1537> the right hand<WG1188> of God<WG2316>.

And <WG1161> they<WG1565> went forth<WG1831>, and preached<WG2784> everywhere<WG3837>, the Lord<WG2962> working with<WG4903> them<WG2532>, and confirming<WG950> the word<WG3056> by<WG1223> the signs<WG4592> that followed<WG1872>. Amen<WG281>.
